The M4 MacBook Air launched in March but a deal on the 15-inch variant already lowers the cost by up to $235. The sale drops the price of the 15-inch M4 MacBook Air to just $1,011.45. That’s a stunning price (the lowest we’ve seen) for a beautiful and powerful macOS notebook. The 13-inch variant also sells for well below the usual.

M4 MacBook Air is on sale

Apple continues the M4 chip onslaught across its Mac lineup — including a new MacBook Air. And the latest chip brings dramatic improvements in performance. This means users can enjoy smooth multitasking, quicker app launches, and extended battery life — all in a fanless, ultra-slim design.

With a brilliant Liquid Retina display, support for up to two external displays, and a lightweight build, the latest Mac laptop is ideal for students, professionals and creatives who need power on the go without sacrificing style or longevity.

The Cult of Mac review said “The 2025 MacBook Air with Apple’s M4 processor comes as close as you can get to a perfect computer for just about everyone.”

Different versions offer either a 13-inch or 15-inch display, and there are deals on both variants of the M4 MacBook Air. But the current best deal is on the 15-inch model in starlight.

Sleek and speedy

M4 MacBook Air (15-inch 2025)

5.0

MacBook Air with the M4 chip lets you blaze through work and play. With Apple Intelligence, up to 18 hours of battery life, and an incredibly portable design, you can take on anything, anywhere.

Pros:

  • Slim and light
  • Gorgeous 15-inch high-res screen
  • Powerful M4 processor

Don’t overlook great deals on M3 and M2 models

The M3 and M2 versions of the MacBook are still formidable machines, “built for Apple Intelligence,” as Apple says, and good for years of use.

The powerful M3 MacBook Air offers excellent performance and energy efficiency. The machine received great reviews for its performance boost when it came out in early March 2024. It boasts a spacious Liquid Retina display — 15 inches or 13 inches — with vibrant colors and sharp text.

The laptop maintains the Air’s signature thin and light design. It includes a Magic Keyboard with Touch ID, a large Force Touch trackpad and a 1080p FaceTime HD camera. The machine supports Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3 for fast connectivity.

Grab these MacBook Air deals before they disappear

Although it’s only been on the market for a couple of months, there’s no reason to pay full price for the M4 MacBook Air. Not when Amazon knocked $100 off.  The best deal is only on the starlight colorway, so shop carefully.
